thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 10 of 3060
thread.title: Gwenn Singleton

author: Gwenn Singleton
title: Gwenn Singleton
text: Easy to book on line but my $125 all inclusive economy car for three days ended up costing me $310.01. They couldn't goner this reservation and couldn't tell me why. My credit card was charged immediately and this was all done at the Avis rental counter the Minneapolis airport. Regrets anger and off are just a few inappropriate words were used. Also, never again.
